content: red-wrapped cheese materials worsted weight yarn in red and off-white size d hook yarn needle 6mm safety eyes optional directions cheese is crocheted in the round at the end of each round do not use a slip_stitch but continue stitching onto the next available stitch if you d like you can use a stitch marker to hold your place cheese with off-white 6sc in magic_ring 6 increase 2sc in each stitch around 12 single_crochet increase around 18 single_crochet around for two row 18 single_crochet decrease single_crochet two together around 12 pause here to insert safety eyes if using and to embroider mouth decrease around 6 and finish off do not stuff red wrapping make 2 with red 6sc in magic_ring 6 increase 2sc in each stitch around 12 single_crochet increase around 18 5sc increase around 21 single_crochet around for two row 21 pause here to ensure that the cheese fits inside the wrapper since the wrapper is made in two parts you ll want the cheese to fit about halfway into the wrapper at this point if the wrapper is too small or too large feel free to add or remove a row to make it just the right size then finish off and leave a tail for sewing once you ve made two wrappers flatten them and attach at one corner so that they open like a hinge copyright 2019 jenni frencham you may sell items you make with this pattern you may not sell this pattern or offer it free of charge on your own site leave this copyright information in place
